column1: '''Oxonmoot 2015''', the 42nd annual [[Oxonmoot]] hosted by [[The Tolkien Society]], took place [[10 September
column2: 10]]-[[13 September]] at St Antony's College, [[University of Oxford
column3: Oxford]]. As with [[Oxonmoot 2014]], Oxonmoot 2015 was an extra day long.

column5: articlename=10 reasons why you should attend Oxonmoot
